Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Irving Park
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Irving Park, Sheridan, & Broadway, due to street blockage near Broadway/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Irving Park, Sheridan, then resume their normal route on Broadway, due to street blockage near Broadway/Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red and Green Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Red and Green Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to police activity.

Shuttle buses have been requested on the Red Line between Fullerton and Sox-35th to provide connecting service through the affected area. Shuttle buses have been requested on the Green Line from Roosevelt to 35th-Bronzeville-IIT to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
